column7: Students present seminars and discussions on advanced topics in areas of actuarial and financial mathematics and advanced analytics. 0 to 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in separate terms or up to 8 hours in the same term if topics vary. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
